Regarding the container delivered to the IC/PC Palm Residence on Saturday, 14th June—containing two packing lists of Paola Lenti outdoor furniture—please find attached a downloadable file including the following documentation and photographs:




https://we.tl/t-z4LyRuMJbj <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/7Ly9CXkNOSkwwrGt6f8hWBGZi?domain=we.tl> 

*	Photo of the container number (MRSU 649419 1 45G1)
*	Photo of the intact container seal (Sealed H 4581027)
*	Photo of the container interior upon opening
*	PDF and PowerPoint versions of the delivery report
*	Packing List 58
*	Excel file for Packing List 58 (with box photographs)
*	Packing List 57
*	Excel file for Packing List 57 (with box photographs)
*	Folder of loose box photographs
*	Signed POA 

Please note:

*       Damaged boxes were identified, marked on the signed POA, and acknowledged by the driver.

*       These boxes were opened and inspected; all contents were found to be in good order. 




As the items are designated for outdoor use and will be placed and styled after the summer, we have stored them securely in the basement storerooms. All textiles and furnishings remain boxed and have been elevated off the ground on crates to ensure protection. Photos of the secured storage setup are included in the zipped file.




I remain at your disposal for any queries or further support.

Linton
